Class MoveHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Handler
      • controller.MoveHandler

  • public class MoveHandler
extends Handler
    Controller/Handler which controls the player move use case
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere, Vincent Reniers and Stefan Pante

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void move(Direction direction)
      Moves in the given direction if it's possible, if it isn't possible, the player doesn't move but does lose an action

        public void move(Direction direction)
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                 java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Moves in the given direction if it's possible, if it isn't possible, the player doesn't move but does lose an action
